Here is my Hololive head cannon - the reason that the AO said Yes about Kiara on different sides of the spectrum is because she has infinite lives, which is also why the AO said that Calli loves Kiara. Kiara doesn’t always remember all of her lives and experiences in the underworld and the living world, so Calli is hesitant to open up to Kiara over and over again, so she’s jaded and calls her “Kusotori” to avoid the constant cycle of getting hurt from Kiara’s memory loss.
Thats depressing
@elnictomeku _ on the flip side, they’re always destined to be together
@Google Poodle that makes even more depressing because it causes Calli to be even more attached

Kiara is innately drawn to Calli, which is why she has skulls in her eyes, because her soul remembers her and that’s why Calli was touched. That’s also why Kiara feels so at ease calling Calli her wife right off the bat and flirting with her. It may be painful for Calli, but she gets to fall in love with a new Kiara every life cycle, since at the basic core of her, she’s the same person. It’s just why she has a hard time opening up to her, because she doesn’t remember all of the good and bad times, and they don’t always find each other, so they don’t end up together every single life cycle. These are all my nonsense hypotheses anyways LOL.
